title: Episode Picker
description: A web application that displays a list of episodes based on the characters selected by the user. It incorporates advanced features such as infinite scroll/pagination, query caching, debouncing, async state management, intersection observer pattern and global store

title: Flybondi
description: Budget-friendly flight search engine for people without a specific destination in mind. For this project I created a DB with thousands of mock flights to multiple destinations and implemented a search algorithm to find the best options for the user in the most efficient way posible.

title: Natours
description: Robust RESTful API with file uploads, emails, Stripe payments, Mapbox, route protection, roles, permissions, security, encryption, geospatial queries, pagination, filters, sorting and more. It also has a front-end created with Pug.

title: Sample Bucket
description: An e-commerce platform for buying music loops/samples. Featuring user authentication, Google Sign-In, product categories, audio previews with playable drum pads and a shopping cart.
